name: Shusse Mahjong Daisettai
overview: Shusse Mahjong Daisettai (出世麻雀 大接待) is a mahjong game for the Sony Playstation. A riichi mahjong game with a unique story mode twist: as an up-and-coming salaryman, rise through the ranks by making your clients and bosses happy, even if it means losing the match.
